title: How to Find the IP Address of a Skype User

steps.title: Open Skype.
steps.content: Open Skype. Click or double-click the Skype app icon, which resembles a blue Skype logo. Doing so will open your Skype main page if you're already logged in. If you aren't logged into Skype, first enter your email address, Skype name, or phone number, then enter your password.

steps.title: Click the "Contacts" tab.
steps.content: Click the "Contacts" tab. It's a person-shaped icon in the upper-left side of the Skype window. Doing so opens your list of contacts. On Windows, you can press Alt + 2 to open your list of contacts.

steps.title: Select a contact.
steps.content: Select a contact. Click the name of the contact whose IP address you want to look up. This will open a conversation window with your selected contact.

steps.title: Click the contact's name.
steps.content: Click the contact's name. This is at the top of the conversation window. Doing so opens a pop-up window.

steps.title: Find the person's username.
steps.content: Find the person's username. Under the "Skype" heading in the pop-up window, you should see a username; this is the name you'll use to look up the person's IP address. On some versions of Skype, you may see the person's username next to the "Skype Name" heading.

steps.title: Open Skype.
steps.content: Open Skype. Tap the Skype app icon, which resembles a light-blue Skype logo with an "S" in it. This will open the main Skype page if you're already logged in. If you aren't logged into Skype, first enter your email address, Skype name, or phone number, then enter your password.

steps.title: Tap the Contacts tab.
steps.content: Tap the Contacts tab. It's in the bottom-right corner of the screen. This will open a list of your Skype contacts. If you're using a tablet, you'll find the Contacts tab at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Select a contact.
steps.content: Select a contact. Scroll down until you find the contact whose IP address you want to look up, then tap the contact's name. A conversation window for the contact will open.

steps.title: Tap the contact's name.
steps.content: Tap the contact's name. It's at the top of the conversation window. Doing so prompts the contact's profile window to pop up.

steps.title: Scroll down to the "PROFILE" heading.
steps.content: Scroll down to the "PROFILE" heading. This option is in the middle of the pop-up window.

steps.title: Find the contact's Skype name.
steps.content: Find the contact's Skype name. Next to the "Skype Name" heading, you should see the person's Skype username. This is the name you'll use to find the person's IP address.

steps.title: Understand what an IP address is.
steps.content: Understand what an IP address is. An IP address is analogous to a mailing address. It can reveal information about a user's Internet Service Provider (ISP) and geographical location, but doesn't show sensitive or private information about the user themselves. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Make sure that the person is actively online.
steps.content: Make sure that the person is actively online. If you see a green Skype logo (or a green dot on mobile) next to their name, they are online and active. If there isn't a green icon or the icon is yellow, you won't be able to look up the person's IP address.

steps.title: Open the Skype Resolver site.
steps.content: Open the Skype Resolver site. Go to http://www.skyperesolver.net/ in your browser.

steps.title: Click the text box.
steps.content: Click the text box. It's the "Enter skype username or IP to resolve" box in the middle of the page.

steps.title: Type in the person's Skype username.
steps.content: Type in the person's Skype username. Make sure that you enter this exactly as it appeared on Skype, taking into account any punctuation, capitalization, and so on.

steps.title: Click Resolve skype to IP.
steps.content: Click Resolve skype to IP . This blue button is below the text field. Doing so prompts Skype Resolver to begin looking for the user's IP address.

steps.title: Review the results.
steps.content: Review the results. After around 30 seconds, you should see a green box with IP information in it appear. You'll be able to see the user's current city and state, as well as their Internet Service Provider and any past IP addresses that they used with Skype.
